content: the **ghost dishcloth** is a fun kitchen accessory for your halloween kitchen decor this washcloth pattern is easy and beginner-friendly it mostly uses single_crochet double_crochet and half_double_crochet stitches **this pattern is written in us terms** **materials** 4 5-mm g/7 us 7 uk crochet hook dk 3 light weight yarn tapestry needle **yarn** i used paintbox yarns cotton dk 137 yds / 125 m per 50 g in the following colors and amounts **a** champ white 403 121 yds / 111 m **b** pure black 402 scrap amounts **c** bubblegum pink 451 scrap amounts feel free to use any comparable yarn that meets gauge **size** 10 25 4 cm by 8 4 21 4 cm **gauge** 18 single_crochet for 23 row **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni
